channel.title: I need a bit of help
channel.description:
Ok I was wondering if there is a way to set your whole server to safe by default so you just make wildy zones?
OR! I made my whole server safe by making my server safe throw 1000 Y and X threw 9999 Y and X. I wa swondering if I can make wildy zone instead

item.title: I need a bit of help
item.dc:creator: @00G00 00G00
item.description:
@00G00 wrote:

sorry, but my post was for the spammer… which had his post deleted…

Read full topic
